addr(bytes32).details: Returns address(0) if expired or not set

addr(bytes32,uint256).details: Returns empty bytes if expired or not set

clearRecords(bytes32).details: Called by registrar on re-registration - new owner gets fresh slate

contenthash(bytes32).details: Returns empty bytes if expired or not set

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setTextFor(bytes32,string,string,bytes).details: Sponsor PKP calls this; signature proves the name owner authorized it Message format: "heaven:records:{node}:{key}:{valueHash}:{nonce}"

text(bytes32,string).details: Returns empty string if expired or not set

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addr(bytes32,uint256).notice: Get address for a specific coin type

clearRecords(bytes32).notice: Clear all records for a node by incrementing version

isActive(bytes32).notice: Check if a node is currently active (for external queries)

isAuthorized(bytes32,address).notice: Check if an address is authorized to modify a node's records

nodeVersion(bytes32).notice: Versioned storage - incremented on clearRecords to invalidate old data

nonces(bytes32).notice: Nonces for meta-tx replay protection (per node)

registerNode(bytes32,uint256).notice: Register a node->tokenId mapping (called by registrar on mint)

setAddr(bytes32,address).notice: Set ETH address for a node

setAddr(bytes32,uint256,bytes).notice: Set address for a specific coin type

setRecords(bytes32,address,string[],stri.notice: Batch set multiple records at once

setRecordsFor(bytes32,string[],string[],.notice: Batch set text records on behalf of the name owner (gasless) Message format: "heaven:records-batch:{node}:{payloadHash}:{nonce}"

setTextFor(bytes32,string,string,bytes).notice: Set a text record on behalf of the name owner (gasless for user)

sponsor().notice: Sponsor address allowed to relay meta-txs
